original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ujjhānasaññī paresaṁ pattaṁ olokenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū ujjhāna saññī paresam pattam olokenti pe

original: “Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṁ pattaṁ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na ujjhāna saññī paresam pattam olokessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
na ujjhāna saññinā paresam pattaḥ oloketabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ujjhānasaññī paresaṁ pattaṁ oloketi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca ujjhāna saññī paresam pattam oloketi āpatti dukkaṭassa
dassāmi iti vā dāpessāmi iti vā oloketi
